org.sql: SELECT projects.id, projects.name, projects.identifier, projects.lft, projects.rgt FROM projects INNER JOIN members ON projects.id = members.project_id WHERE members.user_id = "$1" AND projects.status <> "$2" AND projects.status = "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT projects.id, projects.name, projects.identifier, projects.lft, projects.rgt FROM projects WHERE projects.status <> "$2" AND projects.status = "$3" LIMIT 1

SELECT projects.id, projects.name, projects.identifier, projects.lft, projects.rgt FROM projects INNER JOIN members ON projects.id = members.project_id WHERE members.user_id = "$1" AND projects.status <> "$2" AND projects.status = "$3" LIMIT 1
